text: Volodymyr Rohovsky (21 February 1954) is an association footballer from the former Soviet Union who played for FC Shakhtar Donetsk. In 1979 Rohovsky played couple of games for Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR.Football at the 1979 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR ==References== ==External links== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kherson Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Shakhtar Donetsk players Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:SC Odessa players Category:Association football forwards
title: Volodymyr Rohovsky
